name: SandersonFarmsRecipes
0:
”Alexa, Open Sanderson Farms”
”Ask Sanderson Farms for the Sweet Citrus Glazed Chicken recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sanderson farms
Developer Terms of Use
des:
When you’re cooking, your hands get messy. Sanderson Farms has you covered with Alexa-enabled recipes you can cook hands-free. No “elbow unlock” needed.

To use this skill, click “Enable” above or simply ask Alexa to “Enable Sanderson Farms.” You’ll only have to enable the skill during your first use.
You’ll find Alexa-enabled recipes on our website at SandersonFarms.com/recipes. Here are some phrases you can use to get started.

GETTING STARTED
• “Alexa, ask Sanderson Farms for the Chicken and Veggie Fajitas recipe.”
• “Alexa, get me the recipe for Chicken and Veggie Fajitas with Sanderson Farms.”
TIP: If you’ve been away from Alexa, you’ll need to ask her to open the Sanderson Farms skill by prefacing your request with “Alexa, ask Sanderson Farms…,” or you can say “Alexa, open Sanderson Farms.” You’ll know you’re on the right skill if you’ve heard “Welcome to Cooking with Sanderson Farms.” Or, “Welcome back to Cooking with Sanderson Farms.”
 
WHILE COOKING
• To hear an instruction again, say, “Alexa, please repeat that” or “Alexa, previous step.”
• Alexa can set a timer to remind you when it’s time to check the oven.
TIP: If the light ring on your Alexa is not activated, you’ll need to wake Alexa up by using her name.
